title: Are the NCERTs of geography sufficient for the UPSC Prelims and Mains? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)
Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Hello!! From the perspective of UPSC preparation, NCERT for geography is very very important. Sometimes they are also referred to as the Bible for geography from here we can be sure that NCERT geography is an important source. Yes, they are sufficient for prelims and mains when added with few more important sources, geography NCERT can be more helpful if one also uses G C Leong for geography and since it is a bit complicated subject sources such as the internet must be taken into account.  If you want to buy geography NCERT check them out on mypustak. mypustak is a Calcutta based startup that provides second-hand books at Free Of Cost to all their customers. All you need to do is visit the website and by whichever book you want. You will be required to pay a small delivery and handling charge after that you will get the book at your doorstep. Buy your books from mypustak. Get them at your doorstep and start your preparation All the best
